original_text: Since you died with Christ to the elemental spiritual forces of this world, why, as though you still belonged to the world, do you submit to its rules:
korean_text: 너희가 세상의 초등학문에서 그리스도와 함께 죽었거든 어찌하여 세상에 사는 것과 같이 규례에 순종하느냐

sentences.original_text: to elemental spiritual forces of this world
why, as though you still belonged to the world,
do you submit to its rules:
